title: Le Cadeau
brief_description: An animated film in which a little man after many unsuccessful attempts manages to make a trumpet emit the appropriate sound. This film won first prize for animation at the Westdeutsche Kurzfilmtage and first prize at Cork International Film Festival. Animation by Michel Altermatt and Rene Guillaume. No narration, music only.
